t:type.name: AlexaCapability
t:type.t:description: Represents the Alexa V3 capability structure returned in the endpoint structure

t:attribute.name: type
t:attribute.description: Indicates the type of capability, which determines what fields the capability has.

t:attribute.name: interface
t:attribute.description: The qualified name of the Alexa.Interface that describes the actions for the device.

t:attribute.name: version
t:attribute.description: Indicates the interface version that this endpoint supports.
